overview: There are some 77K foreign students in Ukraine. Naveen S G of India is one of them, studying in Kharkiv and hiding in a shelter. On 1 March, as he goes to buy some food, he becomes the first foreign student killed by Russia in this war. An episode of the web series "Ukraine on Fire 2" by  Vyacheslav Bihun , which had a separate festival distribution as an independent work.
title: Last Call: Indian Son
